
# NationalACH 
![nationalach](https://static.openfintech.io/vendors/nationalach/logo.svg?w=400&c=v0.59.26#w200)  

## General 
 
**Code:** `nationalach` 
 
**Name:** 
 
:	[EN] NationalACH 
 
**Status:** `active` 
 
**Description:** 
 
: [EN]  Get orders from US shoppers that don't have cards, are maxed out on cards, or who simply prefer to pay you with an electronic check.   Accept checks online via API to your site.  Accept MOTO orders though a virtual terminal. Or batch upload via secure FTP. Both standard risk and high risk merchants are welcome to apply. High volume accounts preferred.   Robust online reporting. Track all transactions easily. Generate management reports quickly.  Import and export data to your internal accounting systems.   Electronic checks are used for both one-time & recurring payments. Rates for echeck processing are lower than those for cards. Companies with recurring billing models discover echecks protect cash flow better than card payments since there is rarely a need to update payment information.   Contact NationalACH.com today
